messages.magicReady: Your magic is ready to be performed.
messages.chatMLocked: Chat is disabled at this time
messages.adminMsg: Send an Emergency Message to Moderation
messages.standOnTheTeleport: Stand with your friends on the teleport than press this button to start the game
messages.paidStuffBuyPaypalText: The PayPal payment system web site will open. After payment is finished, your suit will appear in your wardrobe
messages.actionForCitizens: This action is available only for citizens. Do you want to become a citizen?
messages.actionForAgents: This location can only be accessed by agents.
messages.itemForCitizens: This item can only be purchased by Chobots citizens. Do you want to become a citizen?
messages.waitingForOtherPlayers: Waiting for the rest of the players
messages.notActivatedStartup:
Welcome to Chobots world!# Now, you can play games, dress up and decorate your house. Amazing items are waiting for you in your wardrobe! But, if you want to use full chat, you should activate your account, and choose the proper option. The mail with information how to activate your account has been sent to you. If you haven’t received the mail – try to check your spam-box or to resend the mail.
Yours faithfully, Chobots Team
messages.updateFlashPlayer: Would you like Chobots to run it faster? Just install the latest flash player by going to {0}
messages.ignoreUserConfirm: Would you like to add this user to your ignore list?
messages.unIgnoreUserConfirm: Would you like to remove this user from your ignore list?
messages.stuffItemPresent: Yay! You have got an item from Chobots Team for: {0}.
messages.bugsBought: Yay! You have grown rich. You got {0} bugs.
messages.ignoreText: You are added to {0} ignore list
messages.cannotDeletePaidItem: You are not allowed to delete this item
messages.rules:
You are obliged to comply with the rules of Chobots! They are here for your own and others' safety and comfort. You cannot:
  • Exchange personal information such as emails or phone numbers Use inappropriate language Engage in romantic/sexual acts Harass other users Share links that are not related to Chobots Spam or Flood the room with useless messages
    • If you break these rules your chat will be disabled or you will be banned
messages.unignoreText: You are removed from {0} ignore list
messages.badWordWithIntervalHours: You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat for {1} hours. "{0}" is a bad word!
messages.badWordWithInterval: You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat for {1} minutes. "{0}" is a bad word!
messages.badWord: You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat from now on.
messages.skipWord: You are using not allowed words! {0} is not allowed word!
messages.youCanCloseThisIn: You may return to Chobots in {0} seconds.
messages.tradeCannotChangeItems: You cannot add or remove items after the trade has been accepted
messages.tradeCannotChangeNotConnected: You cannot add or remove items without your trade partner
messages.tradeCannotOpen2Windows: You cannot open more than one trade window at once
messages.noMoney: You don’t have enough money to buy this
messages.monthMembershipSMSText: You have bought the status for 1 month
messages.magicNotReady: You will be able to perform magic in {0} minutes.
messages.magicNotReady1: You will be able to perform magic in {0} minute.
messages.tradeItemsChanged: You've got the new items - trade session will be closed
messages.bagIsFull: Your backpack is full! Sorry, but you can’t buy this.
messages.adminBanDate: Your chat is currently disabled by a Chobots moderator. Please, contact support for more information
messages.chatDisabledByAdminHours: Your chat was disabled by Chobots moderator. You can't use the full chat for {0} hours. Please, contact support for more information.
messages.chatDisabledByAdmin: Your chat was disabled by Chobots moderator. You can't use the full chat for {0} minutes. Please, contact support for more information.
messages.membershipFinishingCaption: Your citizenship is about to expire
messages.stuffsAtHome: Your clothes have been sent to your wardrobe
messages.monthMembershipExtendedSMSText: Your status 'Citizen' was extended for 1 month
messages.monthMembershipExtended1: Your status 'Citizen' was extended for 1 month. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipExtended: Your status 'Citizen' was extended for 1 month. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipExtended12: Your status 'Citizen' was extended for 12 months. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipExtended3: Your status 'Citizen' was extended for 3 months. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipExtended6: Your status 'Citizen' was extended for 6 months. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.extendAccountText: Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}. To extend your 'Citizen' status for 1 month, choose your country (and mobile operator if necessary) than press Next button
messages.stuffExists: You’ve already got this. Want to buy the same?
messages.kickOut: You have been kicked out by a moderator. Refresh the page to log in again.
messages.newsDialogBottomText: and don't forget to leave your comments! :)
messages.comboLoginItemMessage: You have logged into Chobots for {0} days in a row. Here is your gift!
messages.friendCanceled: {0} doesn't want to be your friend
messages.teleportReceive: {0} invites you to {1}. Do you want to go there?
messages.friendRemoved: {0} removed you from their friends list
messages.inviteText: {0} wants to be your friend on Chobots!
messages.head: Hair
